data: Habtoor Grand Beach Resort and Spa, Autograph Collection
'The 'No Upgrade' mentioned in the chart would only apply for Room Upgrade and not meal upgrades
Habtoor Grand Beach Resort and Spa, Autograph Collection
For any rate that is on HB (flat rates and discounts), only half of the FB supplement should apply.
Habtoor Grand Beach Resort and Spa, Autograph Collection
Kids go free is not applicable on the child supplement (Extra Bed charge is mandatory)
For contracts or offers valid for EUROPE Market, use the current European market group in the system.
Two Seasons Hotel & Apartments (formerly Gloria Hotel)
For meal supplements with two choices, load the option with higher supplement.
For meal supplements with two choices, load the option with higher supplement.

If the T&C regading the bedding policy of the new contract is same as the existing/old contract, do not charge the extra bed supplement. Extra person may stay in sofa bed. If booked on BB basis, extra person will be charged for the breakfast supplement
Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel Dubai
Please ignore the mentioned ‘extra bed/triple stopsale’ in the inventory chart and and only update the room type’s availability.
One and Only The Palm Dubai
FESTIVE MEAL PLAN - (DEC 26 - JAN 07): New Year festivity supplement  stated in the contract/offer is the GALA DINNER rate which is only for Dec 31.
If the availability chart states 'Room x = On Contracted Rate', this is not an indication that offers will be withdrawn. Team will still stick to the legends provided in the chart.
Anantara Dubai The Palm Resort & Spa
'For any promotion with HB upgrade. Apply the blackout date of the contracted HB upgrade'.
For offers with Room upgrade, add important note in the  INVENTORY NOTE  to close the upgraded room whenever there is a stop sale on lower room.
